document_data.name: Pixie
document_data.refs4e: <ref>{{Cite dragon/420/Fey of Wood and Wind|9}}<ref>{{cite book/Heroes of the Feywild|28}}
document_data.Description: Pixies resembled tiny elves, with reports placing them variously at {{SI|2.5|ft|long=yes}} to as little as {{SI|1|ft|long=yes}} in height. Pixies had silvery, moth-like wings and preferred to wear brightly colored clothing.
document_data.Personality: Pixies were mischievous sprites that enjoyed playing pranks on people. Such pranks included leading travelers astray and tricking misers into parting with their wealth.

Society.Diet: Pixies were active at nighttime. They were herbivorous, eating fruit and nectar.
Society.Homelands:
Pixies tended to live in temperate forest regions, making their villages in deep forest caves.

In [[North Faerûn]], they inhabited the woods of [[Cormanthyr]]. In [[Northwest Faerûn]], they inhabited the [[Laughing Hollow]]. 

Beyond [[Faerûn]], pixies inhabited caves deep in the forests of [[Evermeet]]. On the [[Moonshae Isles]] they could be found in many of its deciduous and coniferous forests, in particular the [[Myrloch Vale]], as well as the kingdom of [[Sarifal]] and [[Llyrath Forest]] on [[Gwynneth]] Isle.{{Cite dragon/376/Realmslore: Sarifal|60, 65}}

In the [[Unapproachable East]], pixies could be found around the woodlands of [[Aglarond]]. Including the grassy meadow known as [[Halendos]].

Beyond the [[Prime Material plane]], some pixies could be found in the [[Elemental Plane of Air]].
Society.Religion: The pixies that inhabited Evermeet were known to worship [[Titania]], [[Oberon]], and other members of the [[Seelie Court]].
Society.Usage: Crushed pixie wings made pixie dust, also called ''[[dust of disappearance]]''. The creation of this dust was, naturally, frowned upon by pixies.

document_data.History:
Pixies were among the creatures believed to have been created by the [[fey]] [[creator race]].<ref>

[[Maerovyna]], a [[druid]] of [[Chauntea]] who led the [[Harvest House]] in [[Daggerford]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], was served by two pixies, a [[grizzly bear]], and a [[leopard]] who were ready to defend her with their lives.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: One legend in the Feywild claimed that pixies stole the secret of making [[honey]] from a goblet of [[mead]] belonging to the [[Summer Queen]] and then sold it to the [[bee]] species as a whole.
